name: Axero Solutions
overview:
Axero Solutions provides enterprise social business and community software solutions.

The flagship product is Communifire.

Communifire is an Enterprise Social Collaboration platform, a more effective alternative to email and traditional intranets and a great way to reduce time spent in meetings.

Communifire empowers employees to share ideas and collaborate on content while still retaining control over who can do and see what. You can bring partners and customers in and limit them to just what they need to see to work closely with you. Everything a group needs is in one place with updates on all your groups coming to you in one place.

Communifire solutions include: Social Networking, Business Collaboration, Social Intranet, Project Management, Knowledge base Solutions, Customer Extranets, Sales & Marketing Communities, Online Communities.

Developed by individuals intimately involved in the evolution of the ASP.NET platform, Communfiire uses leading edge technologies and methodologies to create a platform that is highly customizable and flexible – so that you can get the most out of the platform.

The company was founded in 2007, is a self-funded, private business with its headquarters in San Diego, CA.
